data.features: Programaticaly made pages fetched from Wordpress data,  Easy for user CMS able to create pages using Wordpress editor -gutenberg, Contact form, Quick page rendering
data.description: Es-possible-clone is as title sugest clone of website i made in Wordpress for client. Webpage is made in Gatsbyjs to show my skills as programmer. There are no post or exercises because headless wordpress require live host for wordpress-gatsby-source plugin to work and i decided to make this project totally free of any charge. Data and post are fetch from official gatsby starter "gatsby-starter-wordpress-blog".
data.stack: Gatsby.js, React.js, Node, Graphql, Tailwind, Headless Cms: Wordpress Headless Cms, GraphComments, Formspree
data.title: Es-possible clone

data.features: Projects from repositories presented with programaticaly made pages.
data.description: This is my frontend developer portfolio. Made with Gatsby and GraphCms
data.title: Portfolio

data.features: Programaticaly made: Blog Pages, tags, pagination, images rendering, Gatsby images, styled components, desktop and mobile view - support for < 640px and 1024px
data.description: Homemade Polish Wines is a blog made with use of Gatsby.js and HeadlessCMS.
data.title: Homemade Polish Wines

data.features: Data presentation using data from json file, dynamic filtering over data, tags
data.description: I made this page using design from Fontend mentor. Site features listing job offers by tags with usage of json markdown, React and Tailwind.
data.title: Job listings with filtering solution

data.features: Responsive grid layout, theme switcher, mobile first aproach
data.description: This is simple project i made long ago to learn how to use grid and make a switch button between light and dark mode
data.title: Social Media Dashboard with theme switcher
